data.introduce: 打票机信息查询接口(AirTicketDevice)为用户提供根据打票机号查询打票机信息服务。
data.business: 1.根据office号，查询该office下某打票机的状态信息。
data.functions:
1. 支持国内打票机信息查询
2. 支持国际打票机信息查询
3. 支持BSP打票机信息查询
4. 支持本票打票机信息查询
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketDeviceRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"提取打票机信息请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号：Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketDevice","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机信息","children":[{"name":"@DeviceNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketDeviceRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"提取打票机信息响应","children":[{"name":"DeviceInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机信息","children":[{"name":"@Mode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机的工作方式： TIME-INITIALIZE （定时式）； DEMAND（请求式）； BOTH（并存式）；","children":[]},{"name":"@NACK","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"数据传输是否正常的标 志；正常情况下为空白， 不正常为‘X’","children":[]},{"name":"@Status","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机工作状态 UP/DOWN","children":[]},{"name":"@InputStatus","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"输入状态 ACTIVE/INACTIVE","children":[]},{"name":"@OutputStatus","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"输出状态 ACTIVE/INACTIVE","children":[]},{"name":"@Office","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打印机所属Office","children":[]},{"name":"@PID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机PID","children":[]},{"name":"@ControlPID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"控制终端PID","children":[]},{"name":"@ControlAgent","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"建立控制的工作号","children":[]},{"name":"@Currency","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机可以接受的货币代 码，以及各种货币所 要求保留的小数点位数","children":[]},{"name":"@DeviceAttribute","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机属性，该打票机是 否电子客票打票机","children":[]},{"name":"@DeviceType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打票机类型： 区分国内/国际，BSP/本票","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketAttach","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票证归属","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketAvail","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"可用票号数","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketCount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"等待打印的客票数","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketNumberBegin","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"当前票号段起始票号","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketNumberEnd","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"当前票号段结束票号","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketNumberLatest","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"打印的最后一张客票 的票号","children":[]},{"name":"@PoolStatus","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"保留字段","children":[]},{"name":"@PoolNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"保留字段","children":[]}]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告详细信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息","children":[]}]}]}]}]
